t: Angelina Jolie is launching her own fashion brand
s: May 18, 2023 - Regarding the products, Atelier Jolie will use deadstock materials, and will also be involved in repair and upcycling. Consumers will have the opportunity to breathe life into what may otherwise have been thrown away, and create "quality heirloom garments with personal meaning".
